A declaration is an important part of your CV or resume. Since, the declaration is used to say that the information in your resume is genuine. so, if you want to write a quality resume then you can follow a below-given format for your resume or CV. A resume declaration should have 1 or 2 sentences of declaration content. To the left side and below declaration content, you should add the date and place address. Besides, on the right side and below declaration content, you can, in fact, you should add your signature. Remember: Your name should go below the signature.
